devture_error.401: You are not authorized to access this resource (error 401).
devture_error.404: The requested resource cannot be found (error 404).
devture_error.405: The requested method is not allowed (error 405).
devture_error.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Our team has been notified about the problem.

devture_error.may_try_again_later: You may want to try again later.
